Course.Name: Parallel and Distributed Comp
Course.Description: Presents principles and practices of parallel and distributed computing. Topics include parallel and distributed computation models and architectures; design, analysis and implementation of parallel algorithms; and methods of parallel and distributed programming.
Course.Restrictions: dnu-MED in Educational Admin, MPA in Public Administration, Bus. Admin -Accelerated online
Course.Course-attributes: Degree Elective. CS Instruction Fee - HU
